comments.html: Funny?  That's just frustrating. One person complaining about it despite all the good reasons given to the contrary.  Ivan, I want the last 15 minutes of my life back. :-P
comments.name: Paul Gear

comments.html: Or maybe Bruno and myself just gave up and laugh because crying would be too awkward ;)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
I just read the IETF thread and it's funny as hell.

Dog food, cat food, snippyness, condescending tones, passive aggressive, etc.
Scott Adams could have a lot of fun with this.
comments.name: Bruno Wollmann
